        public static int find(ArrayList<Integer> arr,
                       int startIndex,
                       int number)
        Finds the specified number in a arr starting from startIndex and returns the index of the array.
        Parameters:
        arr - ArrayList < Integer > input array
        startIndex - Integer starting index from where to start the search.
        number - Integer element to find in arr.
        Returns:
        index of the array, if nothing found then returns 0.
